fields.name: Frequency Analysis (1x, Charge 55%):
fields.value: Name a letter. Receive a list of all roles present in the game which contain this letter. You will not receive a role more than once in one list. You will not receive a role in more lists than the number of times it is present in the game. (For example, if there are two Sheriffs in the game, and you guess E, you will receive Sheriff once. If you then guess F, you will receive Sheriff a second time. If you then guess S, you will not receive Sheriff since you have received it twice = the number of times it is present.)

fields.name: Break Cipher (Charge 110%):
fields.value: Name a role and a letter. You will receive a list of players whose name contain that letter but do NOT have the named role.
